import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update front history entry"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/v1/frontHistory/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a Front History entry by an Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the document"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"customStatus":{"description":"Custom status of the front entry","type":"string"},"custom":{"description":"Whether this front history entry tracks a custom front or member","type":"boolean"},"live":{"description":"Whether this front history entry is live","type":"boolean"},"startTime":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"endTime":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"member":{"description":"ID of the member or custom front this entry belongs to"}},"title":"frontHistory"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
